short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Own your favorite products by renting and making low periodic payments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RentDelite is a simple and affordable way to own the latest tablets, TVs, computers, electronics and more at affordable payments without any long-term commitments or interest fees.


*** Find your Product ***
1) Browse our exhaustive list of products varying from Tablets, the latest Tvs, Laptops, electronics and appliances. We update our catalog daily. Our team of shoppers is always on the lookout for the latest products, for the best deals which we pass onto you in lower rental payments.


*** RentDelite is Simple ***
1) Fill out our simple online application that tells us where to ship your product. Your application remains confidential.

2) When you place your order, payments are automatically deducted from your debit or credit card on your paydays, making sure you are never late on your payments.

3) You pay only the rental payment for a year at the end of which you own the product. You have the flexibility to return the product at ANY time within this year without incurring any penalty fees. There are no additional costs and no strings attached.

4) You can choose to own it earlier than 12 months by making a discounted Early Pay Off payment.


*** RentDelite is Fast ***
1) We instantly approve all applications.

2) We tell you immediately what your rental amount for your chosen product will be.

3) We place the order for shipment at the end of the application process and give you a date when you can expect it. We have cut through the delays, the wait times. We have you covered at every step.

4) RentDelite is available at your fingertips – we are online; we are mobile; we are not a store you need to drive to.


*** RentDelite is for Everyone ***
1) Everyone and anyone can access RentDelite and rent a product.

2) Are you 18 or older?

3) Do you have a source of income?

4) Do you have a Credit or a Debit Card?

5) Then come on over, login with your email address and get started.


*** RentDelite is Social ***
1) Love your experience with RentDelite? Go ahead, don’t be shy.

2) Want to know what the others are saying about us? Go ahead, we aren’t bashful.

3) Head over to it at Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Google+
